table.SQL_SELECT_LIST:
set nocount on declare @totalItem int, @totalPage int set @totalItem = ( select count(0) from wcms_Definition where Definition_ID between 50001 and 59999 { and Definition_ID <o> @Search:Definition_ID } { and Definition_Name <o> @Search:Definition_Name } { and Definition_ParentID <o> @Search:Definition_ParentID } ) if (@pageSize < 1) set @pageSize = 10 set @totalPage = ceiling(@totalItem * 1.0 / @pageSize) if (@pageIndex < 1) set @pageIndex = 1 if (@pageIndex > @totalPage) set @pageIndex = @totalPage
select [Definition_ID] ,[Definition_Name] ,[Definition_Note] ,[Definition_Content] ,[Definition_ParentID] ,Definition_O ,case when [Definition_A] = 1 then 'checked' else '' end as [Definition_A] ,0 as [locked] from ( select top (@pageIndex * @pageSize) ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY {@Sort} {@Asc}) as [num] ,[Definition_ID] ,[Definition_Name] ,[Definition_Note] ,[Definition_Content] ,[Definition_ParentID] ,Definition_O ,[Definition_A] from wcms_Definition where Definition_ID between 50001 and 59999 { and Definition_ID <o> @Search:Definition_ID } { and Definition_Name <o> @Search:Definition_Name } { and Definition_ParentID <o> @Search:Definition_ParentID } ) tb where [num] between (@pageIndex - 1 ) * @pageSize + 1 AND @pageIndex * @pageSize select @totalItem, @pageSize, @pageIndex
table.SQL_LOAD_EDIT:
set nocount on
select [Definition_ID] ,[Definition_Name] ,[Definition_Note] ,[Definition_Content] ,[Definition_ParentID] ,[Definition_A] ,[Definition_CreateDate] ,[Definition_ModifyDate] ,[Definition_IsHeader] ,[Definition_R] ,[Definition_O] from wcms_Definition where Definition_ID = @editID
table.SQL_UPDATE_ACTIVE: update wcms_Definition set [Definition_A]= @active where Definition_ID = @editID select @editID
table.SQL_DELETE: if (@delID = 50000 OR @delID = 51000 OR @delID = 52000 OR @delID = 53000) begin select 0 end else begin delete wcms_Definition where Definition_ID = @delID select 1 end
